categories.description: Capture current and historic performance across oil & non-oil revenue sectors and track current year revenue on a month-on-month basis.
Provide information to help enhance the present revenue generation efforts of the Government through revenue optimization and recovery of accrued debts.
Assist the Ministry of Finance to establish a platform for all MDAs to report records on Lighthouse Systems. MDAs access the platform to update debt records progressively.
Support states with insights & intelligence on revenue performance to improve on the revenue shortfalls and budget deficits of the states.
